twoSetSkill.name: Dearmament 2 pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Gain 1 [Falconwings] stack when performing an Ultimate or Combo ATK with this equipped. CD: 3s, CD calculated separately each time. Max stacked [Falconwings] increases Total DMG by 20.0%. Used with QTE, When QTE and [Falconwings] add together, if there are 3 [Falconwings] stacks, increases the Ice DMG by 10.0% for every stack granted by the B-piece of this set.

threeSetSkill.name: Special Plot 3 pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combos) deal an additional 25.0% Ice DMG upon impact. CD 0.3s per target. Max stacked [Falconwings] restore 30.0 HP per second.
